definition: muddled and completely collapsing (idiom); in an awful condition/complete shambles/a total mess
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street

sentences.english: Hungarian-language schools teach Slovak remarkably badly.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利语学校教的斯洛伐克语一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: Better still, the pigs' immune systems are in free-fall.
sentences.chinese: 更让病毒畅行无阻的是，猪的免疫系统一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: Stop obfuscating the information and embellishing it.
sentences.chinese: 不要再刻意润饰各种一塌糊涂的信息了。
地产市场还是一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: The student"s bedroom looked like something the cat dragged in."
sentences.chinese: 这位学生的卧室，脏得一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: I made a proper balls - up of that exam.
sentences.chinese: 那次考试我考得一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: She make a shambles of things.
sentences.chinese: 她把事情搞嘚一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: The margins of his notebook were festooned with doodles.
sentences.chinese: 他的笔记本的空白边被涂得一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: It's a hot day. It's been too tired to many hikers just passing Chi Gu Ping village.
sentences.chinese: 天气热之过，刚过赤菇坪村就把人累得一塌糊涂了。

sentences.english: She make a mess of entities.
sentences.chinese: 她把事情搞嘚一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: The spilt milk made a terrible mess on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶洒在地板上弄得一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: This year, the shattered economy has canceled Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 今年，一塌糊涂的经济勾消了圣诞节的狂欢。

sentences.english: You are such a person is to take the time to gamble and lose in a complete mess.
sentences.chinese: 你等一个人就是拿时间去赌然后输得一塌糊涂。

sentences.english: Much depends on whether organised protest turns into disorganised chaos.
sentences.chinese: 关键在于有组织的抗议是否会变为一塌糊涂的混乱。

sentences.english: Atty so drunk that trial suspended.
sentences.chinese: 律师醉得一塌糊涂，因此审判被暂停。

sentences.english: The spilt milk made a terrible mess on the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶洒在地毯上弄得一塌糊涂。

definition: spectacle too horrible to endure (idiom); tragic sight/appalling scenes of devastation
lit. cuts and bruises all over (idiom); fig. totally refuted
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
not one good point/everything about it is wrong
not up to much/very indifferent/nothing great about it/nothing good to be said about it
lit. dark sky and black earth (idiom)/fig. pitch dark/to black out/disorderly/troubled times
